DOC.brief_summary: Randomised prospective comparison of onlay and sublay mesh repair techniques in incisional hernia
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Results of Randomized Prospective Comparison of Onlay and Sublay Mesh Repair Techniques for Incisional Hernia
DOC.criteria: Incisional hernia Acceptance of the trial BMI>40 ASA score of 4 Severe pulmonary or cardiac disease
